name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Integration Engineer experienced in leveraging **Python** and **Node.js** to develop and implement robust integration solutions. Proficient in utilizing **GCP** for cloud-based architecture and maintaining **IMS** for data management. With a history of driving significant improvements across various sectors including healthcare and finance, I am committed to clean, efficient code and user-centric application design. My expertise encompasses designing scalable and reliable systems that enhance operational efficiency and automation.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Node.js** for developing and integrating solutions in a robust integration system, ensuring seamless communication between diverse modules.
Leveraged **Google Cloud Platform (GCP)** for efficient data storage and management, enhancing data access speed by **25%**.
Designed and implemented Integration Management Systems (IMS) that facilitated tracking and management of workflows, resulting in a **30%** increase in operational efficiency.
Collaborated effectively within cross-functional teams, optimizing integration processes through precise documentation and clear communication in **English**.
Aligned with best practices for software development, maintaining a **99.5%** success rate in integration testing and deployment.
Enhanced system interoperability by creating **RESTful APIs**, ensuring data consistency and easy access to critical information across platforms.
Implemented monitoring tools to track integration performance, leading to the identification and resolution of **15%** more issues proactively.

Utilized **Node.js** for backend service development, achieving a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
Implemented integration with **GCP** services for optimized cloud solutions, ensuring high availability and performance.
Designed and maintained an incident management system (IMS) that improved efficiency in handling critical alerts and issues.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance processes, ensuring effective communication in **English**.
Streamlined development workflows by automating testing and deployment using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, supporting consistency in release cycles.
Executed deployment on **AWS EC2** using **Docker** and **Terraform**, reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.

• Designed and implemented integration solutions using **Python** and **Node.js**, ensuring seamless communication between systems and enhancing operational efficiency.
• Leveraged **GCP** (Google Cloud Platform) for cloud integration, achieving a cost reduction of 20% in infrastructure spending.
• Developed and maintained APIs for data interchange, resulting in a 30% decrease in latency.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define integration architecture, improving team cohesion and project delivery speeds by 25%.
• Utilized **IMS** (Information Management System) for data handling, enhancing data accuracy by 15%.
• Demonstrated strong communication skills in **English**, facilitating effective team discussions and client interactions.

skills:

	Python, Node.js, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

• **Frontend Frameworks**
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

• **API Technologies**
	RESTful API design

• **Serverless and Cloud Functions**
	AWS Lambda

• **Databases**
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

• **Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), GCP, API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

• **Other**
	Microservices, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, IMS, English
